title: Science
description: Although I have left the scientific field right after my Bachelor studies at the Technical University of Berlin, I still maintain a few connections to old teachers and professors. Most of my help is provided in form of software that I have written during and shortly after my time at University. Most notably the trajectory calculations for stars and the gravitational potential used in the A&A paper published by Schulreich et. al. (Numerical studies on the link between radioisotopic signatures on Earth and the formation of the Local Bubble).

title: Astrophysical Fluid Mechanics - 1/?
description:
Working together with Dr. M.Schulreich showed me how much beauty there is in the world of fluid mechanics.
So it's time to dig out the physics text books again to learn more about my favorite topic in physics...
